Title: IE Tablet Enhancer
Description:
This tool is designed to help people who are using tablet PC (such as Exo PC and so on...) to navigate more easely with IE 9.

It's developed using WPF & C#.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This tool is designed to help people who are using tablet PC (such as Exo PC and so on...) to navigate more easely with IE 9.

It's developed using WPF & C#.


Edit 21/05/11 : This project has been modified; it is now a IE BHO (an extension to IE)
It should work (but not tested) on almost all IE version above IE4.
To play with, download the binaries and lauch "register.bat". Then open IE and Activate the Add-on. After that, when you click on a dropdownlist, a black fullscreen window should appear.

More to come soon.
